CustomField.description: Question Created by the Survey Builder
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Would you like us to send certified notices to your ex-employee(s) prior to forcing-out their balance (required by law)?
CustomField.label: CertifiedNotice

value.fullName: Yes: I want Ubiquity to mail my ex-employee(s) a notice ($10 fee per notice).
value.label: Yes: I want Ubiquity to mail my ex-employee(s) a notice ($10 fee per notice).

value.fullName: No: I (sponsor/trustee) will send the certified notice to my ex-employee(s) myself.
value.label: No: I (sponsor/trustee) will send the certified notice to my ex-employee(s) myself.
